name: g_data_binding_lib
tagline: Data Binding Library in Vala (with g-object-introspection)
body:
### Project overview
g_data_binding_lib mainly serves one purpose only and that is completely abstract application data from application gui without sacrificing any design choices or suffer any penalties.

### Documentation
[Online documentation and step by step examples](https://therebedragons101.github.io/g_data_binding_lib/doc/index.html)

API documentation is written, but it is still not built by default because newer and better build mechanism is on TODO list (I don't like autotools or cmake and current makefile is not full featured or supporting crossplatform). 

### Screencasts
[Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJZj-InbHNSByGiHjweGXIA)

### Authors and Contributors
Author: @therebedragons101

### Support or Contact
Preferred way of reporting any bug, problem or missing feature is github issue tracker
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
